content:
We turned to the wisdom of crowds to find out what might happen in 2019

The world has experienced a rollercoaster ride in recent years. That journey is a reminder, if any were needed, that the future is uncertain. How might 2019 pan out? We turned to the wisdom of crowds (including prediction markets, financial futures, expert panels) to gauge the likelihood of certain events. So take your pick: you can see the future as lying in the lap of the gods—or in our map of the odds.

ex: 网络 碱水；硷液；灰汁

Title: A picture of probabilities
